summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department, abolishing the position of the Internal Investigations Auditor and replacing the Internal Investigations Auditor with an Office of Professional Accountability Review Board, and amending the Seattle Municipal code Chapter 3.28 including Sections 32.28.600, 3.28.620, 3.28.630, 3.28.640, 3.28.650 and SMC 3.28.660.
note: Returned unsigned by the Mayor on December 22, 1999.
